name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RealTwit - See Real Twitter Blue Checkmarks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See who's really verified on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See who is actually verified and who paid on Twitter.

Twitter removed legacy verification on 4/20/23 and RealTwit brings back the old experience everyone loved and trusted.
